Package main

Class CSVHandler

java.lang.Object
main.CSVHandler
public class CSVHandler
extends java.lang.Object
CSVHandler is class for reading from and writing to the csv files.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CSVHandler()
    Class constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • CSVHandler

      public CSVHandler()
      Class constructor. Opens 3 csv files for a system.

  • Method Details

    • writeToProperties

      protected void writeToProperties​(java.lang.String s) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes into properties output file
      Parameters:
      s - the String line in format eircode,address,current market value, location type,YES or NO for property being principal private residence
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if we can't write to the properties file

    • writeToTax

      protected void writeToTax​(java.lang.String s) throws java.io.IOException
      Adds a new tax entry for a property to the CSV files
      Parameters:
      s - the String in format "eircode,ownerId,year due,year paid,paid/notpaid"
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - cannot write to tax.csv

    • writeToOwners

      protected void writeToOwners​(java.lang.String s) throws java.io.IOException
      Adds a new entry to owners csv file
      Parameters:
      s - the String line in format "ownerId,first name,surname, eircodes of properties (still owned or sold)"
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - cannot write to owners.csv

    • readFromProperties

      public java.lang.String readFromProperties​(java.lang.String eircode)
      Reads a csv entry about a property for eircode specified
      Parameters:
      eircode - the String for the eircode
      Returns:
      the property details in format "eircode,address,property value,location category, YES or NO (if property is principal residence),current owner's ID", nul if eircode not found

    • readFromTax

      public java.lang.String readFromTax​(java.lang.String eircode)
      Reads a tax entry from csv file for a given eircode
      Parameters:
      eircode - The String for eircode
      Returns:
      the String for tax entries in format "eircode,ownerId,year due,year paid,paid/notpaid,ownerId,year due,year paid,paid/notpaid...", null if eircode not found

    • readFromTax

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readFromTax​(int year)
      Obtains a list of property eircodes that have tax overdue from a particular year
      Parameters:
      year - the integer for the year
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of Strings for tax overdue, each in format "owner id,year due,0,notpaid", null if no such entries found

    • readFromTax

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readFromTax​(int year, java.lang.String routingKey)
      Queries the csv tax file to find the csv entries for properties with tax overdue in particular area for year specified
      Parameters:
      year - the integer for the year to query
      routingKey - the String of the routing key of the area to query
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of Strings with tax entries

    • readTotalFromTax

      public double readTotalFromTax​(java.lang.String routingKey)
      Queries the csv tax file to find the total tax paid for particular area nased on routing key
      Parameters:
      routingKey - the String of the routing key
      Returns:
      the double with the sum of tax paid

    • readAverageFromTax

      public double readAverageFromTax​(java.lang.String routingKey)
      Finds the average value of tax paid in a particular area
      Parameters:
      routingKey - the String for the routing key
      Returns:
      double for the average tax paid, 0 if no tax paid entries exists for the area

    • readNumAndProcFromTax

      public java.lang.String readNumAndProcFromTax​(java.lang.String routingKey)
      Obtains the number of properties with tax paid in area specified by routing key and the percentage of taxes paid
      Parameters:
      routingKey - the String with the routing key for the area to query
      Returns:
      String in format "number of tax payments,percentage of taxes paid", "0.0,-1.0" if no tax entries found

    • readFromOwners

      public java.lang.String readFromOwners​(java.lang.String ownerId)
      Reads an entry in a csv file for the owner specified
      Parameters:
      ownerId - the String for owner ID
      Returns:
      the owner details in format "ownerId,first name,surname, eircodes of properties (still owned or sold)"

    • changeTaxPaymentStatus

      protected void changeTaxPaymentStatus​(java.lang.String eircode, int year, double nAmount)
      Updates the csv file for tax to mark the tax as paid in this year
      Parameters:
      eircode - the String for the eircode
      year - the integer for the year tax payment was due
      nAmount - the double to be updated for the amount paid for the tax including any late fees

    • removeLine

      protected void removeLine​(java.lang.String fileType, java.lang.String line)
      Removes the specified line from the csv file specified
      Parameters:
      fileType - the String for file type to modify, either "properties", "tax" or "owners"
      line - the String for line to be removed from the csv file
